vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (patch_3.sol#13-24):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_3.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_3.sol#23)
	- userBalances (patch_3.sol#22)
